text: Love Songs is a compilation album by Keyboardist Yanni, released on the Private Music label in 1999. The album peaked at #1 on Billboard's "Top New Age Albums" chart and at #98 on the "Billboard 200" chart in the same year. ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== *Official Website * Category:Yanni albums Category:1999 compilation albums Category:Private Music compilation albums
title: Love Songs (Yanni album)
